name: Bitland
description:
Updates for this game from now on will also be done on my website:

https://www.rosscogames.net/bitland.html

Please read the community guidelines before registering:
https://www.rosscogames.net/bitlandrules.html

Bitland is an online brick-building sandbox game where players build whatever they want out of smaller, interlocking plastic bricks using various different tools. The tools include the hammer, which places bricks (Press Q and E to place higher and lower), the saw which destroys bricks, the wrench which changes the properties of the bricks (double click), and the paintbrush which re-colors bricks.
